jobDescription: Responsibilities: AIHL has an opening for a geologist specializing in microscopy analysis for our Anaheim, CA office.The Microscopist will assist other personnel in the Lab by assisting with gross, determining appropriate processing of various types of specimens, verbal and electronic communication with customers, and perform any other non-technical duties when asked by the technical staff and or supervisor.Maintains laboratory supplies and performs routine housekeeping duties.Follows all departmental procedures and practices related to laboratory safety, data documentation, and good laboratory hygiene practices. Requirements:
